1.0.0.name: wordpress/layout-engine
1.0.0.description:
Layout Engine simplifies the process of features rich theme building using LessCSS, provides new ways to define default layout and possiblity to override layout by end users using simple drag and drop interface.

Try the Demo

If you're interested in seeing what Layout Engine has to offer, try out the Test Drive!.

Layout Engine Test Drive | Watch in action

More Information

Visit the Layout Engine website for more information.
